1.text: Cross the 2 string ends to create an X shape.

2.text: Feed the left-hand string into the opening near the waistband.

3.text: Wrap the left-hand string around and back into the opening.

4.text: Wrap the left-hand string around the right-hand string again.

5.text: Lay the left-hand string over the right-hand string above the X cross.

6.text: Bring the left-hand string around and through the newly-created loop.

7.text: Pull on the left-hand string to make the knot taut.

8.text: Slide the knot up and down the right-hand string to adjust it.

9.text: Pull the string loop out so it makes an oval shape.

10.text: Divide the oval into 2 equal “bunny ear” loops.

11.text: Squeeze the long sides of each “bunny ear” together.

12.text: Tie a basic shoelace knot with the 2 strings you created.
